Summary: lights in woods ,over the tree tops , then it moved stayed over house for a second . the took off like it was never there . no noise
divs: Sighting Detailsit was very early morning , i woke up to look at my boy freind lookin out sliding glass window in bedroom , i asked what are u looking at , he said a light way out 3 blocks out in the woods , i saw same thing for about 10 minunets, then it moved closer we could see colored lights very faint . white red green yellow i think iy happened so fast after he lihjt out in thr wood saw very still for a while , once it moved it stayed over the house only seamed for a second ,then gone so fast , i said to my boyfriend wrf was that...no noise , no shaking no nothing but what we saw . we boyh ran to the front of the house is when we saw it take off to quick to try to even think about gettin a camara .... i know what i saw . it was not a plane , or anything hand made ,, 20 years or more i saw some that looked the same an i called my g friend to have her look out side i was about the same thing i saw in dec, 2011 in pike county ... i do have to say i am scared .. i feel like i as taken at one time .. i dont know how to explain , just something i feel deep inside me .....amd i am noy crazy , nuts , on drugs , drinks ,, i am straigt very normal person .. maby a bed writer about that ....
